name: Pointing Test
description: Pointing test to be pass to OSVE

segments.pointing_request_snippet:
<block ref="OBS">
      <attitude ref="track">
        <boresight ref="SC_Zaxis" />
        <target ref="Ganymede" />
        <phaseAngle ref="powerOptimised">
          <yDir>false </yDir>
        </phaseAngle>
      </attitude>
      <metadata>
        <comment>Track Power Optimised Ganymede</comment>
      </metadata>
    </block>

default_block:
<block ref="OBS">
      <attitude ref="track">
        <boresight ref="SC_Zaxis" />
        <target ref="JUPITER" />
        <phaseAngle ref="powerOptimised">
          <yDir>false </yDir>
        </phaseAngle>
      </attitude>
      <metadata>
        <comment>Track Power Optimised Jupiter</comment>
      </metadata>
    </block>
